Footer.description: We create modern web solutions that move your business forward. We focus on quality, speed, and client satisfaction.

HomePage.heroSubtitle: We will create a modern and profitable website or e-shop for you that will set you apart from the competition.

services.title: Website Development
services.description: We will create a modern and responsive website for you that will attract and sell.

services.title: E-shop Development
services.description: We will develop a custom e-shop for you that will be fast, secure, and ready for your business.

services.title: Digital Marketing
services.description: We will make your brand visible online and bring you new customers through effective strategies.

HomePage.portfolioSubtitle: Check out examples of our work.
HomePage.processSubtitle: A quality website is the result of a well-planned process.

processSteps.title: Consultation & Analysis
processSteps.description: At the beginning, it's important to understand your goals and needs. We will analyze your competition and propose a strategy.

processSteps.title: Proposal & Design
processSteps.description: We will create a modern and engaging design that will represent your brand and appeal to your target audience.

processSteps.title: Development & Testing
processSteps.description: Our team of experienced programmers will turn the design into a fully functional and responsive website. We test everything thoroughly.

processSteps.title: Launch & Support
processSteps.description: After your approval, we will launch the website. But our work doesn't end there. We also provide subsequent support and maintenance.

HomePage.whyUsSubtitle: We are a team of enthusiasts who love what they do. Every project is unique to us, and we approach it with maximum commitment.

testimonials.quote: The collaboration with Moder was really great. They created exactly the kind of website we wanted. Fast, professional, and at a reasonable price. I recommend them!
testimonials.name: Martin Š.

testimonials.quote: Quickly corrected the mistakes of past programmers and made the site operational and secure.
testimonials.name: Oleksandr Kapitan
testimonials.role: CEO, AAAA Kapitan s. r. o.

HomePage.ctaSubtitle: Don't hesitate to contact us. We will be happy to prepare a non-binding custom quote for you.

AboutPage.heroSubtitle: We are a team of creative professionals united by a passion for modern technology and a sense for detail.
AboutPage.storyText1: Our journey began in 2020 with a simple vision: to create websites that not only look good but, more importantly, deliver results. We believe that a successful website is a combination of engaging design, flawless code, and a well-thought-out marketing strategy.
AboutPage.storyText2: Today, we are proud to have helped dozens of clients launch or advance their online businesses. Every project is a new challenge for us, which we approach with enthusiasm and determination.

ServicesPage.heroSubtitle: We specialize in creating modern, fast, and secure web solutions built on the most popular technologies.
ServicesPage.websitesText1: We create websites that not only look great but are also highly functional and user-friendly. We use modern technologies like Next.js and React, which guarantee speed, security, and scalability. Each website is designed from the ground up with your goals and your customers' needs in mind.
ServicesPage.websitesText2: Our goal is to create a digital business card that will represent you with dignity and help you grow.
ServicesPage.eshopsText1: For your online business, we will create a custom e-shop that is ready for success. With platforms like WooCommerce and Shopify, we create robust and easily manageable online stores. We focus on a great user experience, a seamless purchasing process, and optimization for mobile devices.
ServicesPage.eshopsText2: From product import to payment gateway integration – we take care of everything so you can focus on selling.
ServicesPage.projectsSubtitle: Browse our work and get inspired for your next project.

benefits.title: Flexibility and Scalability
benefits.description: The open ecosystem allows for almost unlimited possibilities for customization and adding new features.

benefits.title: Responsive Design
benefits.description: All our websites are fully responsive and look great on all devices – from mobile phones to large monitors.

benefits.title: SEO-Friendly
benefits.description: We emphasize technical SEO optimization so that customers can easily find you in search engines.

ServicesPage.servicesListSubtitle: We provide comprehensive services from design to long-term support and development of your website.

PortfolioPage.heroSubtitle: Check out the projects we are proud of and that have helped our clients succeed.

CustomProgrammingPage.heroSubtitle: We transform your unique ideas into functional and robust web applications, systems, and solutions tailored to your requirements.
CustomProgrammingPage.visionText1: Do you have specific requirements that standard 'off-the-shelf' solutions don't meet? Do you need an internal system, a client portal, or a complex web application? Our custom programming services are here for you.
CustomProgrammingPage.visionText2: We focus on a detailed understanding of your processes and goals to create software that not only works but also genuinely simplifies your work and brings measurable results.
CustomProgrammingPage.whyCustomSubtitle: Investing in custom software is an investment in the future and efficiency of your business.

features.title: Speed and Efficiency
features.description: We optimize code for maximum performance and fast application response.

features.title: Security First
features.description: We implement the latest security standards to protect your data.

features.title: Scalability
features.description: Our solutions are designed to grow with your business.

features.title: Clean and Maintainable Code
features.description: We write code that is easy to read, extend, and maintain for the future.

CustomProgrammingPage.processSubtitle: A transparent and proven procedure for successful project delivery.

processSteps.title: Requirement Analysis
processSteps.description: We deeply analyze your needs and goals to design the optimal solution.

processSteps.title: Architecture and Design
processSteps.description: We will design a robust architecture and UX/UI design that ensures a great user experience.

processSteps.title: Development and Implementation
processSteps.description: Our team of experts will program your solution with an emphasis on quality and performance.

processSteps.title: Testing and QA
processSteps.description: We thoroughly test every aspect of the application to ensure its flawless operation.

processSteps.title: Deployment and Launch
processSteps.description: We will ensure a smooth deployment to production and the launch of your application.

processSteps.title: Support and Maintenance
processSteps.description: We provide long-term support, monitoring, and maintenance for hassle-free operation.

CustomProgrammingPage.ctaSubtitle: Contact us for a non-binding consultation and a quote for your custom solution.

BlogPage.heroSubtitle: Stay updated with the latest trends and tips in web and marketing.

ContactPage.heroSubtitle: Have a project or an idea? Write to us, and together we will turn it into reality.

PrivacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicyPage.lead: Your privacy is important to us. In this privacy policy, we explain how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
